amendment.description: Amendment requires a report from the U.S. Marine Corps to Congress regarding the proposed transfer of land from the Bureau of Land Management to the U.S. Marine Corps for the expansion of 29 Palms for a Training Range Facility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 53 printed in House Report 112-485 to require a report from the U.S. Marine Corps regarding the proposed transfer of land from the Bureau of Land Management to the U.S. Marine Corps for the expansion of 29 Palms for a Training Range Facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bartlett amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
